name: 7 Days Survival: Forest
description:
7 Days Survival: Forest - open world game, the genre of FPS. We are in a world where there was no war of the worlds, there was nothing. You are a survivor in the district, in order to survive on, you have to look for supplies and weapons.


The game is in its early stages of development. Once you have downloaded it, you are helping in the rapid development.


- Realistic graphics
- Ability to deforestation
- The study area
- Optimization
